headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Capture Game Modes Now Available
content:
Capture, the newest addition to the collection of team-based modes in Grand Theft Auto Online, is now available.

With 20 new Jobs across four unique modes, this GTA twist on classic capture the flag style confrontations brings a whole new level of adversarial action to the world of Los Santos and Blaine County.

These new Jobs will be accessible in Freemode after you download the latest free GTA Online update.
